summary: Code is running mpv player with no audio and loading an .ass subtitle file to display over a video. The user is experiencing issues with the output.

details.comment: Code is running mpv player with no audio and loading an .ass subtitle file to display over a video. The user is experiencing issues with the output.
details.content:
rootpath=/root/Desktop/works/pyjom
mpv --fs --no-audio --sub-file="$rootpath/tests/karaoke_effects/lrc2ass_py3/output.s2.ass" "$rootpath/samples/video/karaoke_effects_source.mp4"
